author: Video Advice
description:
Itzhak Bentov’s discoveries were unlike anything the world had seen. Soon after he began sharing them, his life ended in a mysterious crash. Years later, the CIA released only fragments of his research — but buried in obscurity, his wife carried the original notes. What you’re about to see reveals a side of reality few ever get to witness.

title: He died after CIA took his work... but his wife kept the original notes
